headline: Super Micro Computer (SMCI): Profit Margin Decline Tests Bullish Revenue Growth Narrative This Earnings Season
summary: Super Micro Computer (SMCI) is forecasting revenue growth of 12.5% per year, outpacing the US market average of 10.5%. Over the last five years, the company delivered an impressive 50.2% average annual earnings growth, but most recently, net profit margins declined to 4.8% from last year’s 7.7%, highlighting tightening profitability despite continued expansion at the top line. Investors now face a classic trade-off: strong historical and projected revenue growth versus margin compression and...
